scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: shx rm -rf test-project && pnpm run copy-templates && pnpm vitest --run && pnpm run test:vanilla && pnpm run test:react && pnpm run test:react-ecs && pnpm run test:phaser && pnpm run test:threejs
scripts.test:phaser: bin/cli.js --name test-project --template phaser && pnpm --dir test-project install && shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:react: bin/cli.js --name test-project --template react && pnpm --dir test-project install && shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:react-ecs: bin/cli.js --name test-project --template react-ecs && pnpm --dir test-project install && shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:threejs: bin/cli.js --name test-project --template threejs && pnpm --dir test-project install && shx rm -rf test-project
scripts.test:vanilla: bin/cli.js --name test-project --template vanilla && pnpm --dir test-project install && shx rm -rf test-project
